mainText:
Thank you Steve not only for what you did for this world but personally for
me.  I began using Apple computers in graduate school and continued today in
my consulting business.  I have been poked fun and not considered a serious
business person due to use of MacBooks in my business.  I guess I got the
last laugh as I repeatedly told all that you can have wintels and apple is
and will always be my computing source.  God bless Steve Job and thank you
for being such an influence in my life.  May Steve's legacy ALWAYS be
retained in every product designed & produced by Apple.  Steve Jobs is and
always will be Apple.
header: He touched my academic & professional life
author: Bobby
